an11.17:4.1: * “Ekādasahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako abhabbo gogaṇaṃ pariharituṃ phātiṃ kātuṃ.
an11.17:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, gopālako na rūpaññū hoti, na lakkhaṇakusalo hoti, na āsāṭikaṃ hāretā hoti, na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hoti, na dhūmaṃ kattā hoti, na titthaṃ jānāti, na pītaṃ jānāti, na vīthiṃ jānāti, na gocarakusalo hoti, anavasesadohī ca hoti, ye te usabhā gopitaro gopariṇāyakā te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
an11.17:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, ekādasahi aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako abhabbo gogaṇaṃ pariharituṃ phātiṃ kātuṃ.
an11.17:5.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekādasahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
an11.17:5.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na rūpaññū hoti, na lakkhaṇakusalo hoti, na āsāṭikaṃ hāretā hoti, na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hoti, na dhūmaṃ kattā hoti, na titthaṃ jānāti, na pītaṃ jānāti, na vīthiṃ jānāti, na gocarakusalo hoti, anavasesadohī ca hoti, ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
an11.17:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na rūpaññū hoti?
an11.17:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ () ‘cattāri mahābhūtāni, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an11.17:6.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na rūpaññū hoti. (1)
an11.17:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na lakkhaṇakusalo hoti?
an11.17:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘kammalakkhaṇo bālo, kammalakkhaṇo paṇḍito’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an11.17:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na lakkhaṇakusalo hoti. (2)
an11.17:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na āsāṭikaṃ hāretā hoti?
an11.17:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ adhivāseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantīkaroti na anabhāvaṃ gameti, uppannaṃ byāpādavitakkaṃ …
an11.17:8.4: uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme adhivāseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantīkaroti na anabhāvaṃ gameti.
an11.17:8.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na āsāṭikaṃ hāretā hoti. (3)
an11.17:9.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hoti?
an11.17:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hoti anubyañjanaggāhī;
an11.17:9.3: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjati;
an11.17:9.4: na rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ nāpajjati.
an11.17:9.9: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya nimittaggāhī hoti anubyañjanaggāhī;
an11.17:9.10: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjati;
an11.17:9.11: na rakkhati manindriyaṃ, manindriye saṃvaraṃ nāpajjati.
an11.17:9.12: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vaṇaṃ paṭicchādetā hoti. (4)
an11.17:10.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhūmaṃ kattā hoti?
an11.17:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena paresaṃ desetā hoti.
an11.17:10.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhūmaṃ kattā hoti. (5)
an11.17:11.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na titthaṃ jānāti?
an11.17:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā, te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā na paripucchati na paripañhati:
an11.17:11.4: Tassa te āyasmanto avivaṭañceva na vivaranti, anuttānīkatañca na uttānīkaronti, anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ na paṭivinodenti.
an11.17:11.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na titthaṃ jānāti. (6)
an11.17:12.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na pītaṃ jānāti?
an11.17:12.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamāne na labhati atthavedaṃ, na labhati dhammavedaṃ, na labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ.
an11.17:12.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na pītaṃ jānāti. (7)
an11.17:13.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vīthiṃ jānāti?
an11.17:13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an11.17:13.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vīthiṃ jānāti. (8)
an11.17:14.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gocarakusalo hoti?
an11.17:14.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattāro satipaṭṭhāne yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an11.17:14.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gocarakusalo hoti. (9)
an11.17:15.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṃ saddhā gahapatikā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārenti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārehi.
an11.17:15.3: Tatra bhikkhu mattaṃ na jānāti paṭiggahaṇāya.
an11.17:15.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anavasesadohī hoti. (10)
an11.17:16.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā, te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti?
an11.17:16.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā, tesu na mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpeti āvi ceva raho ca, na mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ …
an11.17:16.3: na mettaṃ manokammaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpeti āvi ceva raho ca.
an11.17:16.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā, na te atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti. (11)
an11.17:17.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, ekādasahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjituṃ.
